text: Greg Heffley is a character from the series Diary of a wimpy kid. Jeff Kinney struggled to become a newspaper cartoonist before he came up with the idea for Greg in early 1998. In all of his appearances, Greg is presented as a self- righteous narcissist who is obsessed with becoming wealthy and well-known, has little to no moral integrity, and thinks solely of himself. ==References==
title: Greg Heffley
